title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.)
OB: When launching the Help view on Win2K (Windows 2000), the tab key does not have any effect or functionality.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the Help view on Win2K (Windows 2000).
2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not have any effect or functionality.
